TestCase.name: query 1 hash join
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T1 as select * from t, t3 where t.v2 = t3.v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t1]) RwStreamHashJoin(condition=[=($1, $4)], joinType=[inner]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3,_row_id]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t3]], columns=[v1,_row_id])
